document_data.name: Syllabub Fran
document_data.mainbody: '''Syllabub Fran''', better known as '''Shimmer''', was a dancer and performer from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Syllabub was a [[human]] man with dark bronze skin and brown eyes. His long hair was of striking blue color, matches by the blues of his outfit.
document_data.Activities: When he was not performing, Shimmer could be found intoxicated and passed out in or near the [[Blushing Mermaid]] tavern.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Shimmer was a regular performer who entertained the customers of the shady Blushing Mermaid tavern in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of Baldur's Gate. Shimmer was a popular performer, known for his loud make up, glittering outfits, and impressive dancing. He had one devoted fanâ€”a young girl named [[Mindi]], too young to actually frequent the Blushing Mermaid, but the child passionately begged Shimmer to let her become his apprentice.
